profile:
Foremost Furnishings, Upholstery Repairs in Barrie

Ray’s Restoration is one of the leaders in the furniture repair and upholstery industry in the Barrie area. We do furniture and kitchen cupboards restoration as well as reupholstery. We have mastered the art of dedicated craftsmanship and unparalleled quality in furnishings and wood repair. No matter how much of your office or home furniture needs restoration, no service is too big or too small for our dedicated team. You can call us on +17057305507 for a quote or to book.

Master Craft Upholsterers
There’s no need to throw away any of your furnishings just because they’ve got a little rip in the fabric. If you’re planning on buying or selling a piece of furniture you should allow a member of our crafty upholstery team repair your sofas, armchairs and fabrics back to their original health. This can be a great way of adding value to a furnishing that may have seen better days. You can always be guaranteed of a high-quality and professional service with Ray’s Restoration.

Why Choose Us?
We have vast experience repairing and reconditioning all kinds of furnishings and upholstery, and our process guarantees we repair and care for your furnishings as quickly and efficiently as possible. Never compromise when it comes to quality, let us take care of your furniture repair needs. We would be honoured to have you as a customer.
